description:
E-Mail persists after many decades and will continue to survive Chat, Skype, etc. - just as roaches have survived the atomic bomb. Despite being a pest, E-Mail is also an effective marketing channel and the most personal communication you have with your users and customers.

Julie NG is a freelance developer and consultant, working with companies to apply responsive design and best practices to their websites and email communications.
short_description: E-Mail persists after many decades and will continue to survive Chat, Skype, etc. - just as roaches have survived the atomic bom
title: Mastering E-Mail & the Internet's Cockroach
